**Tender Reference Information**
--------------------------------

* ID: WS3723119617-Doc3723256023
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: WS3723119617
* Publication Date: October 27, 2022

**Tender Cancellation Notice**
-----------------------------

This tender has been cancelled. Please refer to the original tender notice for details.

**Original Tender Notice:**
---------------------------

### Request for Proposal

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) hereby issues the Request for Proposal (RFP) #WS3723119617 for the supply and delivery of one (1) new self-contained, towable “disc style” wood chipper.

### Requirements

* The wood chipper must be capable of chipping trees and brush with a trunk diameter of 9” or greater.
* All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2023.

### Tendering Process

This tender will be conducted in a competitive, open bidding process.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price offered.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the terms and conditions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contractor Contact Information
---------------------------------

For inquiries, please reach out to Eric Kwan, Procurement Officer:

* Email: [eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (Not provided)

### Additional Information
-------------------------

A copy of this tender notice is available on the Ariba Discovery portal: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483867?extsite=MTQ0ODM4NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483867?extsite=MTQ0ODM4NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg)==
